EmailTemplate.name: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1330033423.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners (1330033423.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Test - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Pete, Thanks for the email. I wanted to follow upon the voicemail I just left you as well. We would be happy to add sections from your contract to our MSA. I would need to see what the sections would be before I can guarantee we could use them but I am sure we could work it out. When your contract is ready please send me the sections you were thinking about adding to our MSA. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. <span style='font-size:10.0pt;font-family:"Tahoma","sans-serif";mso-fareast-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:windowtext> PM [mailto:eightdigit@live.com] Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2012 2:17 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: Thank You for Your Interest in MBO Partners Hi Sara, I've already had a couple phone calls with MBO as I am considering using your services for one of my first customers to learn how you manage payroll, contracts and other aspects of a contract job. My concern is regarding contracts that are presented to clients I will do work for.
I understand you already furnish standard contracts that protect consultants. I am having my own contract for software development created and reviewed by Internet attorneys. So I'd like to know if I can add some parts of that contract to yours should I use your services for this client. If it's too messy then I may just perform the work under my own contract.
Thank You, Pete
On 2/23/2012 2:01 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Dear Pete, Thank you for taking the time to contact MBO Partners. My name is Sara Conde, an MBO Partners Enrollment Manager, and I will reach out to you within one business day. If you prefer, you can easily schedule a phone appointment with me by visiting <https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS">https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>. I look forward to speaking with you! Best regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6070e: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com">sconde@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com<span style='mso-bookmark:_MailOriginal>
